thread.section_title: Custom Boxes Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Custom Boxes Now | customboxesnow.com
thread.title: Pete on behalf of HP
thread.title_full: Custom Boxes Now reviewed by Pete on behalf of HP

author: Pete on behalf of HP
title: Pete on behalf of HP
text: I have never used this company before. There is a sea of competitors on the index page when you google this product / service, so I had no specific guidance and just chose this brand. I have not received my boxes yet, but their press/production and shipping was very timely as was their response time to my messages. I will say that the representative I was in contact with (I won't mention his name) was not pleasant. He made me feel like a nuisance for contacting him (even over the website chat). Spending $1,500 I know I am a SMALL fish, but the intention was for this to be an ongoing quarterly order. After being made to feel like a nuisance I will reconsider my options. Had this person been even slightly more personable and behaved like a glad representative of the company, I would proceed with the utmost confidence (given that the product arrives and is of the quality I would expect...) This feedback is meant as constructive and I hope it helps their staff see the consumer side of the transaction.
